title: Start
body:
<<move Aig StageLeft2>><<move Lee StageRight2>>
<<outfit Aig Casual>>
<<outfit Lee Casual>>
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
<<expression Lee Neutral>>
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Hey Aigburth.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Yeah? What's up?
<<name Friendship Lee>>
You seem to be working REALLY hard.
->Of course!
    <<expression Aig Happy>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    I sure have. Gotta make sure we're ready for this weekend, you know?
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    Well, yeah but...
    <<expression Aig Neutral>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    But what?
->Thanks!
    <<expression Aig Happy>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Thanks! I'm just trying to keep up.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    That's good, but...
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Neutral>>
    But what?
->Yeah, it's been hard.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Yeah.  It's been kind of rough, but I've been pulling through.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    You sure?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Yeah, why?
<<name Friendship Lee>>
It's just, you've got bags under your eyes.
Have you been getting enough sleep?
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Uh, well...not really.
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Practice is important, but make sure you rest too.
You're no use to anyone if you're just going to be sluggish on stage.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
I guess you're right.
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee Happy>>
<<statUp Friendship Lee>>
Get some sleep, ding dong.
